thread.title: Watch Justin Bieber Make Beats in Front of a Portrait of Himself
thread.title_full: Watch Justin Bieber Make Beats in Front of a Portrait of Himself

author: Bianca Giulione
title: Watch Justin Bieber Make Beats in Front of a Portrait of Himself
text:
While badboy Justin Bieber has been allegedly headbutting people, peeing his pants, and faking sick to skip a legal deposition, he’s also been cooking up some new jams in the studio. The Canadian singer took to Instagram yesterday to post a new video featuring lush beats, ambient lighting, and, notably, a tasteful portrait of himself. Check them out below.
Making beats in my studio 
A post shared by Justin Bieber (@justinbieber) on Feb 28, 2017 at 5:54pm PST 

A post shared by Justin Bieber (@justinbieber) on Feb 28, 2017 at 5:58pm PST 

In addition to working on his own in the studio, he’s been working on a collaboration with Altanta rapper 2 Chainz , dancing in a T-Mobile Super Bowl ad , and celebrating his 23rd birthday, which was yesterday. While there has been no official word yet as to whether we’ll get a new Bieber album this year, he’s spending this spring and summer performing around the world, extending his “Purpose” Tour and maybe hanging more pictures of himself in his studio.
While you wait for new Bieber beats to drop, revisit his DJ Snake collab, “Let Me Love You” below. 

In other music news, Chance the Rapper was just added to this year’s Essence Festival. Get the lowdown here .
